name: Appreciation
description: Develop a mindset of gratitude and appreciation for learning opportunities.

name: Antifragility
description: Learn to thrive in uncertainty and become stronger through challenges.

name: Stoicism
description: Cultivate emotional resilience and rational thinking.

name: Think like a CEO
description: Develop strategic thinking and leadership skills.

name: Embrace failure
description: Learn to see failure as a stepping stone to success.
